title: 3 Acre Land for sale at Kalpitiya Kitesurfing Lagoon
details:
Property Ref :Rwmy - 03

This is a beautiful 3 acre lagoon front land cultivated with palm trees at Kalpitiya. The land is facing the famous kite surfing lagoon of Kalpitiya and
provides direct access to the waters.

The land is slightly elevated from the sea level providing a beautiful view of the lagoon. The depth of the lagoon at this particular spot is considerably deep providing easy navigation for boats and canoes.

The land is located approximately 2 kms from Kalpitiya town in a calm and serine environment. There are already a kite school and resort in operation very close to this plot.The land is ideal for a kite school, resorts, private bungalows, or any other tourism projects.

Now available for immediate sale with-

- Clear Deed And Title ( Sinnakkara)
- Good Road Access
- Electricity
- Water
- Fully Fenced

Asking price is LKR 11mln/Acre

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details.

Thanks for looking :)
